svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - July 5 2018

• A long list of Ethereum dev tools . Fun fact: this was originally my idea. It’s not comprehensive
enough yet (so please submit!), and there’s room for people to create curated/annotated/opinionated
forks of this list.
A long list of Ethereum dev tools . Fun fact: this was originally my idea. It’s not comprehensive

Coie.

First wave of Devcon4 ticket sales at 8am PDT on July 9th.
• Why are gas fees so high right now ? Because an exchange encouraged spamming the network for
listings. So scam tokens are spamming hard. New ATH on daily transaction fees . by a lot.
Why are gas fees so high right now ? Because an exchange encouraged spamming the network for listings.
So scam tokens are spamming hard. New ATH on daily transaction fees . by a lot.

Proposal and discussion of improved fee markets
Live on mainnet
• SONM is live on mainnet
SONM is live on mainnet
• Aventus ticketing is also live on mainnet
Aventus ticketing is also live on mainnet
• Liquidity Network is live on mainnet and you can try it here . Jeff Coleman tweetstorm says it is a
version of Plasma Cash and thinks he sees a possible operator attack. Hopefully they verify their code
imminently.
Liquidity Network is live on mainnet and you can try it here . Jeff Coleman tweetstorm says it is a

• EIP1186 : eth_getProof

• Phil Daian: On-Chain Vote Buying and the Rise of Dark DAOs , followed up a day later by Vote Buying,
On-Chain Governance, and Quadratic Plutocracy . The future of onchain coinvoting looks bleak.

If you appreciate this newsletter, thank ConsenSys
This newsletter is made possible by ConsenSys , which is perpetually hiring if you’re interested.
Editorial control is 100% me. If you’re unhappy with editorial decisions, feel free to tweet at me.
Shameless self-promotion
Most of what I link to I tweet first: @evan_van_ness
